title: Brighton/Allston apt with laundry in unit, parking + huge private yard
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 31892536', 'Rent: $3,200 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Allowed', 'Rent Includes:: Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'Conveniently located apartment on Lower Allston-Brighton line features 2-3 bedrooms, modern kitchen, laundry in unit and more!', 'Sept 1st availability!', 'Classic apartment layout with bonus bedroom on lower level offering 3 possible bedrooms, living room, large updated kitchen and bathroom.', 'Best of all this apartment has exclusive use of the large back porch and a huge back yard!', '2 car off-street parking in driveway included (not shared).', 'The location offers easy access to Boston via Boston landing Commuter rail station (0.4 mi walk) as well as Harvard expanding Allston campus (HBS, SEAS), walking distance to 2 grocery stores, Speedway development and multiple brewery outposts and local restaurants!', 'This apartment packs a punch with all that it offers.', 'Here is a video: https://youtu.be/y-iUaFvMNYs', 'FEATURES', 'Ceiling fans', 'Close to public transportation', 'Convenient location', 'Disposal', 'Eat-in Kitchen', 'Gas stove & dishwasher', 'Granite countertops', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry in Unit', 'Microwave', 'Modern Bath', 'Modern Kitchen', 'New Appliances', 'Off-street parking', 'Private back deck with yard', 'Stainless Steel Appliance(s)']
